title: Filebase
subtitle: S3-compatible cloud object storage service powered by blockchain and the Sia network.

title: Vup
subtitle: Private and decentralized open-source cloud storage app with encrypted file sharing and media streaming support.

title: S5
subtitle: Content-addressed storage, but fast. Works with Sia and any S3-compatible storage provider, such as Filebase.

title: Pixeldrain
subtitle: File sharing site that uses the Sia network.

title: NextCloud
subtitle: Nextcloud is a suite of client-server software for creating and using file hosting services. Interested in building a NextCloud Sia integration? Apply for a Grant!

title: renterd S3 Gateway
subtitle: S3 is a widely adopted object storage protocol created by AWS. Interested in building an S3 renterd gateway? Apply for a Grant!

title: Grafana Exporter
subtitle: Grafana is a widely adopted open source analytics & monitoring solution. Interested in building a Grafana exporter for hostd? Apply for a Grant!

title: Benchmarking Tools
subtitle: With the recent release of hostd, the Sia Foundation would like to see the community get creative and build new benchmarking and scoring tools. Interested in building a benchmarking tool for Sia? Apply for a Grant!

title: Host Monitoring Tools
subtitle: Running a host requires good stability and uptime, it would be useful to have monitoring tools that track status and alerting tools that send email or SMS notifications when a node goes offline. Interested in building a monitoring tool for hostd? Apply for a Grant!

title: Host Browser
subtitle: The Sia Central Host Browser lets you explore and filter Sia hosts by a variety of criteria.

title: Lite Wallet
subtitle: The Sia Central Wallet is a web-wallet with support for seed, ledger, and watch modes.

title: Explorer
subtitle: Blockchain explorer for the Sia network.

title: Siastats
subtitle: Charts, metrics, and explorer for the Sia network.

title: Hosts Monitor
subtitle: SiaStats Hosts Mointor provides ranking and metrics for Sia hosts.

title: Host Troubleshoot Tool
subtitle: The Sia Central Host Troubleshoot Tool lets you troubleshoot issues with your Sia host.

title: Foundation Tracker
subtitle: The Sia Central Foundation Tracker track the Sia Foundation subsidy transactions from the blockchain.

title: Sia Ledger Sweep
subtitle: Tool for sweeping all of the SC stored on a Ledger into a new address. This is helpful if you lost (or broke) your Ledger, but still have the seed written down somewhere.

title: CoinMarketCap
subtitle: Basic information and financial charts for the Sia network.

title: Decentralizer
subtitle: Sia companion app that provides renters with more granular controls over hosts and contracts.

title: TrySia
subtitle: Give Sia a spin with this Docker image that includes a fully-synced node and ready-to-use file contracts.

title: Luxor
subtitle: Mining pool for Siacoin.

title: SiaMining
subtitle: The first and largest mining pool for Siacoin.

title: DxPool
subtitle: Leading blockchain infrastructure service provider.

title: f2pool
subtitle: Popular crypto mining pool provider.

title: Kraken
subtitle: Based in the USA, Kraken is one of the largest and oldest Bitcoin exchanges in the world.

title: Poloniex
subtitle: Based in the USA and recently acquired by Circle, Poloniex is a popular crypto-to-crypto exchange.

title: Crypto.com
subtitle: Crypto.com is a popular crypto-to-crypto exchange. It is a trusted and secure platform for users to trade top cryptocurrencies with the lowest fees in the industry.

title: change now
subtitle: ChangeNOW is a non-custodial service created for simple and fast cryptocurrency exchanges.

title: Upbit
subtitle: Based in South Korea and partnered with Bittrex, Upbit is a popular crypto-to-crypto exchange.

title: SevenB
subtitle: A simple & straightforward crypto broker, powered by Binance.
